thread.title: Celebrity Big Brother star Heavy D expecting baby with pregnant ex-fiancee Bryony Anne Harris
thread.title_full: Celebrity Big Brother star Heavy D expecting baby with pregnant ex-fiancee Bryony Anne Harris

author: Hayley Minn
title: Celebrity Big Brother star Heavy D expecting baby with pregnant ex-fiancee Bryony Anne Harris
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Celebrity Big Brother star Heavy D’s ex-fiancee Bryony Anne Harris is pregnant with his first child. 
The couple announced their split in December last year, but now it seems they’re back together and expecting a baby. 
Bryony announced the news on her Youtube channel, telling her fans she is 11 weeks pregnant with the Storage Hunters star. 
The 21 year old rings Heavy D in the video, and asks him what he thinks. Read More Heavy D is expecting a child (Photo: Channel 5) His ex-fiancee Bryony Harris is pregnant (Photo: YouTube/Bryony Harris) The couple split back in December 
He says: "If you're happy then I'm happy." 
She half-jokingly replies: "I'm happy I'm having a baby but I don't know if I'm happy I'm having it with you!" 
"So, I am pregnant… Argh!" she then told her YouTube viewers. 
"It’s so scary to say! And I didn’t think I’d be saying it at 21 years old – nearly 22. 
"I never wanted children until I met Colin. I’m currently 11 weeks and one day pregnant." 
Bryony and Heavy D , real name Colin Newell, began dating in August 2016, shortly after he left the Celebrity Big Brother house. Read More She showed off the picture of her scan (Photo: YouTube/Bryony Harris) She's 11 weeks pregnant (Photo: YouTube/Bryony Harris) 
She explained she and Heavy had been trying to conceive back when they were "really happy" together. 
"When you fall in love with someone, it’s like yeah. I want you to bring up my family with me," the brunette explained. 
However, Bryony discovered she was pregnant after the duo had already split in December last year. 
She revealed she didn’t miss her period, but got out the shower one day and noticed that her nipples were different. Bryony is very excited about becoming a mum (Photo: YouTube/Bryony Harris) 
"I went into my sisters room and was like "Look at my nipples. Look at them!" And she was like "I’m not looking at your nipples!"," she said 
"And I was like 'Please, they’ve got bumps on them. Little bumps.' Which is weird. 
"And I just felt all day like I was pregnant." 
Bryony also confirmed she and Heavy D are "back on track" and happy about their exciting news. Like us on Facebook
